price: নিশ্চয় আকাশসমূহ আৰু পৃথিৱীত মুমিনসকলৰ বাবে আছে বহুতো নিদৰ্শন।
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin lil'mu'minīna
